creator: Enablon
descriptionHtml:
The Enablon Inspection solution is designed to securely answer checklists generated by the Enablon Sustainability Suite.

The app, which guides users through a series of questions, automatically switches from on-line to off-line mode and is fully connected to your Enablon solution. This also enables you to access data anywhere, anytime and on any mobile device.

Enablon Inspection gives users the ability to:

• Easily perform and browse inspection thanks to its intuitive workflow and responsive interface.

• Create observation and upload photo or video evidence.

• Access observations and key inspection information including scope, due date, and progress.

• Use the App’s off-line mode to synchronize and access data on-the-go.

Enablon is the world’s leading provider of Sustainability, EH&S and Operational Risk Management Software. More than 1,000 global companies and 1 million users rely on Enablon solutions to manage their environmental and social performance, minimize risks and improve profitability. Enablon offers the most comprehensive platform in the industry, and is consistently recognized as a global leader and visionary.
descriptionShort: Enablon Inspection solution is designed to securely create and answer checklists

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fix:
- Negative numbers can be typed correctly

General bug fixes and improvements
Security improvements

- Email are now mandatory while reporting a bug
Fixes:
- General bug fixes and improvements

title: Enablon Inspection

creator: Enablon
descriptionHtml:
The Enablon Inspection solution is designed to securely answer checklists generated by the Enablon Sustainability Suite.

The app, which guides users through a series of questions, automatically switches from on-line to off-line mode and is fully connected to your Enablon solution. This also enables you to access data anywhere, anytime and on any mobile device.

Enablon Inspection gives users the ability to:

• Easily perform and browse inspection thanks to its intuitive workflow and responsive interface.

• Create observation and upload photo or video evidence.

• Access observations and key inspection information including scope, due date, and progress.

• Use the App’s off-line mode to synchronize and access data on-the-go.

Enablon is the world’s leading provider of Sustainability, EH&S and Operational Risk Management Software. More than 1,000 global companies and 1 million users rely on Enablon solutions to manage their environmental and social performance, minimize risks and improve profitability. Enablon offers the most comprehensive platform in the industry, and is consistently recognized as a global leader and visionary.
descriptionShort: Enablon Inspection solution is designed to securely create and answer checklists

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features:
- App is now available in Hungarian
- Performance improvements while updating data
- Email are now mandatory while reporting a bug
Fixes:
- General bug fixes and improvements

• Create observation and upload photo or video evidence.

• Access observations and key inspection information including scope, due date, and progress.

• Use the App’s off-line mode to synchronize and access data on-the-go.

Enablon is the world’s leading provider of Sustainability, EH&S and Operational Risk Management Software. More than 1,000 global companies and 1 million users rely on Enablon solutions to manage their environmental and social performance, minimize risks and improve profitability. Enablon offers the most comprehensive platform in the industry, and is consistently recognized as a global leader and visionary.
descriptionShort: Enablon Inspection solution is designed to securely create and answer checklists

Bug:
Fix related to the "Create as Many as" Inspection
Fix on the new authentication when using Google as an ID Provider
General bug fixes and improvements
